name: Papeer Auktioneer - Team 6
description:
Veer, veer Ladies, Gents and behoOld... time has come, our _perhaps YOUR!_ chance to meet your match! Own, sell, some, if not THE world’s most valued treasures of our modern times. BUT price it must have! As nothing in Papeer Auktioneer is on the house! LISTEN! And listen carefully as you don’t have much time. REACT! As I have only one set of eyes, and YOU, one opportunity to strive. Papeer Auktioneer is a fast paced point and click where the goal is to find, aim and click on the rarest items on screen.  The player is provided with a list of the most desired and rarest items, he must compare the items on that list to those offered by the crowd. That's not a simple task, as the crowd is in constant movement, jumping around in all directions.  Therefore, timing and precision is key to success.  You incarnate an auctioneer searching for the world’s rarest collectibles in the world’s most exquisite underground shops of 50’s LA. Surrounded by fame, glory and glamour your customers do their bidding and it’s up to you to decide which is the most valuable. By being quick in observation and decision making you have to choose between the offered items, the ones that match your preferred selection. Features
  • Carton cutout, eccentric and profound designs
  • Randomly generated character designs with 8 257 436 possibilities!
  • Punishing gameplay
Fun
  • Aim and click against the clock
  • With precision and a bit of luck, collect the rarest items and gain renown
  • Make mistakes and be booed at by an uptight crowd
  • Observe and anticipate the actions of an erratic crowd constantly moving
  • Also, beat Papeers on their heads with hammer
Controls
  • Left Click
Game Requirements
  • At least 1 finger
  • PC
  • Mouse
Credits
